titles.title: Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Act
To establish the Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area in the State of Washington, and for other purposes.
Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

bill.summary:
Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Act
Establishes the Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area in the state of Washington.
Directs the Department of the Interior to designate a willing local unit of government or a nonprofit organization to serve as the coordinating entity for the Heritage Area, which shall prepare and submit a management plan for it.
